title: Can anyone identify this font please?
content:
Can anyone identify this font please? It appeared in TSR’s Ad&d 2nd ed Dark Sun Product “Elves of Athas”, here are some samples:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [winddancers mod2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826095818/http:/typophile.com/files/winddancers%20mod2.jpg) | 102.29 KB |
| [nightrunners mod.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090826095818/http:/typophile.com/files/nightrunners%20mod.jpg) | 65.71 KB |
author: NineDaysDead

comments.content:
This looks like hand lettering (not a font). Duplicate letters are not identical.

- Mike Yanega
